itemDisplayName: Deploy a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with a secondary node type having Ephemeral OS Disks
description: This template takes a minimum set of parameters and deploys a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with 2 node types. One node type contains Ephmeral OS Disks.
summary: This template takes a minimum set of parameters and deploys a Standard SKU Service Fabric managed cluster with 2 node types. One node type contains Ephemeral OS Disks.
